CRD_1.synopsis:
In SwA, the owlbear cub speaks in short staccato 'sentences.' He's vicious and feral - but scared. If the player coaxes him with food or is nice to him, he will cautiously consider approaching - but is scared off before he gets too close.An owlbear cub - young, but still dangerous - appears in camp. The player has previously spared the cub after killing its mother, and saved it from a cruel game run by the goblins in their camp.
The cub is scared, and quick to run or attack - it's an untamed wild animal.
CRD_1.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. oe qnight NIGHT_OwlbearCub1_43696ea8-3bff-440d-bee8-9cd912e4e8b44. End the day and go to camp5. Go to sleep, the dialog will start

CRD_2.synopsis:
IMPROTANT: If players help the cub in this dialog, it becomes the permamement camp follower.In SwA, the owlbear cub speaks in short staccato 'sentences.' He's vicious and feral - but scared. He's slightly injured, and playing it up more than it is, and he's distrustful of the player at first. If the player helps him, he becomes excited and runs off to hunt. In the next night, he returns with a dead bird.The owlbear has appeared in camp for a second night.  The player has previously spared the cub after killing its mother, and saved it from a cruel game run by the goblins in their camp.
He reacts much more suspiciously of the player if they antagonised him in their first encounter.
CRD_2.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. oe qnight NIGHT_OwlbearCub2_5cc6fbd5-0b70-4fb5-a29c-9b7ed9e39fcc4. End the day and go to camp5. Go to sleep, the dialog will start

CRD_1_32.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player wakes up in a middle of a night because the owlbear cub approaches it

CRD_1_117.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_117.context: CinematicNodeContext: Faces the player, stamping a footNodeContext: As in: 'I want food! I'm hungry!"

CRD_1_25.speaker: Player
CRD_1_25.text: I have food. Would you like it?

CRD_1_134.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_134.context: CinematicNodeContext: Takes a tiny step forward.NodeContext: As in: 'Yes, I want it!'

CRD_1_98.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_98.context: CinematicNodeContext: Devours the food.NodeContext: As in: 'I want more food!'

CRD_1_72.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Owlbear unsure then eats foodNodeContext: As in: 'Can I eat it? Are you a friend?'

CRD_1_137.speaker: Player
CRD_1_137.text: On second thought, I'll have it myself.

CRD_1_10.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cub prepares to chargeNodeContext: As in: 'No, I want the food! I want to eat it! I'll bite you!'

CRD_1_62.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Stands, then plops back down onto all fours.NodeContext: As in: 'No, I'm strong and big!'

CRD_1_27.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Begin to approachNodeContext: As in: 'AND big! Are you a friend?'

CRD_1_59.speaker: Player
CRD_1_59.text: You don't look very strong to me.

CRD_1_124.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_124.context: CinematicNodeContext: Begins to charge.NodeContext: As in: 'I'll show you! I'll bite you!'

CRD_1_97.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Owlbear bowls past player and keeps running, into the night.NodeContext: SFX only - do not record

CRD_1_94.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_94.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player stumbles, owlbear charges, starting combat. NodeContext: As in: 'I'll bite you! I'll KILL you!'

CRD_1_93.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Slows down, but doesn't stop. No longer aggressive, but curious.NodeContext: As in: 'Are you sorry? Are you a friend?'

CRD_1_74.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ready to attackNodeContext: As in: 'You're a liar! I'll bite you!'

CRD_1_54.speaker: Player
CRD_1_54.text: Go away. You're not welcome here.

CRD_1_43.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_43.context: CinematicNodeContext: *The cub slinks into the darkness, his footfalls heavy with grief.*NodeContext: As in: 'You're bad and mean!'

CRD_1_37.speaker: Narrator
CRD_1_37.text: *You recognise the feathered creature - it's the owlbear cub you rescued.*
CRD_1_37.context: CinematicNodeContext: The owlbear quivers and steps back - scared and hostile.

CRD_1_65.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Watching the player cautiously.NodeContext: Curious, but cautious.

CRD_1_19.speaker: Player
CRD_1_19.text: Fetch a piece of food from your bag.

CRD_1_12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hold pose at the end

CRD_1_82.speaker: Narrator
CRD_1_82.text: *The cub's eyes lock onto the food in your hand.*

CRD_1_47.speaker: Player
CRD_1_47.text: Toss the food to the owlbear.

CRD_1_15.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player tosses the food in front of the owlbear

CRD_1_6.speaker: Narrator
CRD_1_6.text: *The creature gulps the food down - it seems he hasn't eaten in some time.*

CRD_1_83.speaker: Narrator
CRD_1_83.text: *With a hungry chirp, he steps forward - he wants more.*
CRD_1_83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Begins to move toward the player.

CRD_1_16.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Begins to move toward the player.NodeContext: SFX only do not record

CRD_1_41.speaker: Player
CRD_1_41.text: Bah. Now that you've fed it, we'll never be rid of the beast.

CRD_1_30.speaker: Player
CRD_1_30.text: Careful. Once that thing's eaten through the camp, it might start looking at you hungrily.
CRD_1_30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Walks up.NodeContext: The player is feeding an orphaned owlbear that's been accepted into the camp. Shadowheart observes and comments.

CRD_1_84.speaker: Player
CRD_1_84.text: Oh my gods, look at its little beak! C'mere, you doll...
CRD_1_84.context: CinematicNodeContext: Walks up.NodeContext: Beckoning to an owlbear, which she finds adorable.

CRD_1_123.speaker: Player
CRD_1_123.context: CinematicNodeContext: Walks up.NodeContext: Walking up to an owlbear cub

CRD_1_132.speaker: Player
CRD_1_132.text: When I see a creature as sweet as that, I hardly miss the Gate at all.

CRD_1_8.speaker: Player
CRD_1_8.text: The hand that feeds is the hand that's loved. It'll never leave your side now.

CRD_1_99.speaker: Player
CRD_1_99.text: It'll be back for more rations, mark my words.

CRD_1_89.speaker: Player
CRD_1_89.text: I'm not chasing after it, if that's what you're thinking.

CRD_1_49.speaker: Player
CRD_1_49.text: Damn it! We scared it off. Poor little beaky fella - hope he finds his way back.

CRD_1_127.speaker: Player
CRD_1_127.text: Oh now look, you've scared off the little snack.
CRD_1_127.context: NodeContext: Owlbear cub got spooked and ran away

CRD_1_125.speaker: Player
CRD_1_125.text: It'll be back. Be on your guard, or risk getting a peck!

CRD_1_22.speaker: Narrator
CRD_1_22.text: *Alarmed by your companion's approach, the cub flees into the forest.*

CRD_1_100.speaker: Narrator
CRD_1_100.text: *Alarmed by your companion's approach, the cub turns heel and runs.*

CRD_1_68.speaker: Narrator
CRD_1_68.text: *As he approaches, his foot lands on a dry twig, snapping it in half.*
CRD_1_68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Steps forward, snaps a twig.

CRD_1_35.speaker: Narrator
CRD_1_35.text: *Frightened by the sharp noise, he turns tail and runs into the forest.*

CRD_1_60.speaker: Narrator
CRD_1_60.text: *Frightened by the sharp noise, he turns tail and runs away.*

CRD_1_91.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_1_91.context: CinematicNodeContext: Runs off.NodeContext: SFX only - do not record

CRD_1_40.speaker: Player
CRD_1_40.text: Keep the food held out in front of you.

CRD_1_64.speaker: Narrator
CRD_1_64.text: *He takes a hesitant step toward you, his beak chittering hungrily.*

CRD_1_39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Take a nervous step forward.NodeContext: SFX only - do not record

CRD_1_46.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player eats tiny piece of food in a quick bite

CRD_1_85.text: *The cub's eyes light with hungry rage as he begins to charge.*

CRD_1_13.speaker: Narrator
CRD_1_13.text: *Any food you had is gone. The owlbear will go hungry.*
CRD_1_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Owlbear watches, unmoving. Player looks at hand.

CRD_1_103.speaker: Player
CRD_1_103.text: Wait for him to approach you.

CRD_1_87.speaker: Narrator
CRD_1_87.text: *The cub tilts his head. He does not trust you - yet.*

CRD_2_131.speaker: Player
CRD_2_131.text: Let me see, or the leg will fall off and I'll eat it for dinner.

CRD_2_112.speaker: Player
CRD_2_112.text: Behave, or you'll end up like mother.

CRD_2_103.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_2_103.context: CinematicNodeContext: Moves to attack the playerNodeContext: As in: "I'll bite you. I'll KILL you!"

CRD_2_63.context: NodeContext: As in: 'You're loud! Don't hurt me! I'm already hurt!'

CRD_2_105.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_2_105.context: CinematicNodeContext: Holding out his legNodeContext: As in: "Be careful! It hurts!"

CRD_2_70.speaker: Player

CRD_2_61.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_2_61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking at player thankfullyNodeContext: As in: "This is good! It doesn't hurt anymore!"

CRD_2_37.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_2_37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Stands up to show 'big', then plops back downNodeContext: As in: "Something with teeth and claws. It was bigger than me!"

CRD_2_73.speaker: Player
CRD_2_73.text: You fought something bigger than you? Why?

CRD_2_102.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_2_102.context: CinematicNodeContext: Stamps his feetNodeContext: As in: "I'm strong. I wanted to fight. I wanted to win!"

CRD_2_100.speaker: Player
CRD_2_100.text: Take on something closer to your own size next time.

CRD_2_120.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_2_120.context: CinematicNodeContext: Thinking hard, looking upNodeContext: As in: "It was too big... wait!"

CRD_2_18.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_2_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: BashfullyNodeContext: As in: "No, I didn't kill any."

CRD_2_96.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_2_96.context: CinematicNodeContext: Runs awayNodeContext: As in: "I'm strong! I'll show you!"

CRD_2_89.speaker: Player
CRD_2_89.text: Brilliant. Now we'll never be rid of it.
CRD_2_89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Walks up and comments.NodeContext: Sarcastic

CRD_2_128.speaker: Player
CRD_2_128.text: The little beast's quite charming once you get accustomed to the smell of rotting flesh.
CRD_2_128.context: CinematicNodeContext: Walks up and comments.NodeContext: The player has bonded with an orphaned owlbear cub that's joined their camp. Shadowheart observes and comments.

CRD_2_59.speaker: Player
CRD_2_59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Walks up and comments.NodeContext: Stars in her eyes, referring to the owlbear cub that's befriended the camp.

CRD_2_58.speaker: Player
CRD_2_58.text: Adorable. Let me know when it brings you something fresh.

CRD_2_124.speaker: Player
CRD_2_124.text: Cute. 'Til it grows up and gnaws your arm off, at least.

CRD_2_71.speaker: Player
CRD_2_71.text: You do realise these things grow, do you not? Teeth and talons first.

CRD_2_45.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_2_45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player rubs the owlbear's head. Cub closes his eyes happily.NodeContext: As in: 'You're a nice friend. I won't bite you!'

CRD_2_122.speaker: Narrator
CRD_2_122.text: *The creature coos happily - he feels safe.*

CRD_2_65.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_2_65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sits down happily.NodeContext: SFX only - do not record

CRD_2_64.speaker: Player
CRD_2_64.text: Gods. Not even fully grown and you're already trouble.

CRD_2_47.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_2_47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Runs awayNodeContext: As in: "I'm NOT trouble! I'll show you!"

CRD_2_115.speaker: Player
CRD_2_115.text: Go on, then. You're all better.

CRD_2_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Runs into the forestNodeContext: As in: "I'll come back. I'm strong, you'll see!"

CRD_2_125.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_2_125.context: NodeContext: As in: "Get back! Don't hurt me!"

CRD_2_35.speaker: Player
CRD_2_35.text: It's barely a scratch. You'll be fine.

CRD_2_104.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tests the weight on his legNodeContext: As in: "It's all good? I'm strong!"

CRD_2_26.speaker: Owlbear Cub

CRD_2_123.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CRD_2_123.context: CinematicNodeContext: Runs awayNodeContext: As in: "I have to run. I have to hide!"

CRD_2_107.speaker: Player

CRD_2_127.speaker: Player
CRD_2_127.text: I want you out of my camp.
